com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker

Class CircuitBreakerRpcClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.client.DecoratingClient<I,O,I,O>
      • com.linecorp.armeria.client.SimpleDecoratingClient<I,O>
        • com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker.CircuitBreakerClient<RpcRequest,RpcResponse>
          • com.linecorp.armeria.client.circuitbreaker.CircuitBreakerRpcClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client<RpcRequest,RpcResponse>

    public final class CircuitBreakerRpcClient
extends CircuitBreakerClient<RpcRequest,RpcResponse>
    A Client decorator that handles failures of RPC remote invocation based on circuit breaker pattern.

    • Method Detail

      • newDecorator

        public static Function<Client<RpcRequest,RpcResponse>,CircuitBreakerRpcClient> newDecorator(CircuitBreaker circuitBreaker,
                                                                                            CircuitBreakerStrategy<RpcResponse> strategy)
        Creates a new decorator using the specified CircuitBreaker instance and CircuitBreakerStrategy.

        Since CircuitBreaker is a unit of failure detection, don't reuse the same instance for unrelated services.

        Parameters:
        circuitBreaker - The CircuitBreaker instance to be used

      • newDecorator

        public static Function<Client<RpcRequest,RpcResponse>,CircuitBreakerRpcClient> newDecorator(CircuitBreakerMapping mapping,
                                                                                            CircuitBreakerStrategy<RpcResponse> strategy)
        Creates a new decorator with the specified CircuitBreakerMapping and CircuitBreakerStrategy.

      • newPerMethodDecorator

        public static Function<Client<RpcRequest,RpcResponse>,CircuitBreakerRpcClient> newPerMethodDecorator(Function<String,CircuitBreaker> factory,
                                                                                                     CircuitBreakerStrategy<RpcResponse> strategy)
        Creates a new decorator that binds one CircuitBreaker per RPC method name with the specified CircuitBreakerStrategy.
        Parameters:
        factory - A function that takes a RPC method name and creates a new CircuitBreaker.

      • newPerHostDecorator

        public static Function<Client<RpcRequest,RpcResponse>,CircuitBreakerRpcClient> newPerHostDecorator(Function<String,CircuitBreaker> factory,
                                                                                                   CircuitBreakerStrategy<RpcResponse> strategy)
        Creates a new decorator that binds one CircuitBreaker per host with the specified CircuitBreakerStrategy.
        Parameters:
        factory - a function that takes a host name and creates a new CircuitBreaker

      • newPerHostAndMethodDecorator

        public static Function<Client<RpcRequest,RpcResponse>,CircuitBreakerRpcClient> newPerHostAndMethodDecorator(Function<String,CircuitBreaker> factory,
                                                                                                            CircuitBreakerStrategy<RpcResponse> strategy)
        Creates a new decorator that binds one CircuitBreaker per host and RPC method name with the specified CircuitBreakerStrategy.
        Parameters:
        factory - a function that takes a host+method and creates a new CircuitBreaker
